title: Gold LFT
body:
Hi I'm Antkins, i recently started playing LoL again after a long break.

I was Mid gold back in Season 3 when i stopped playing, skipped all of Season 4. I've been playing again for a few weeks now and am currently Gold 5.

LFT around the Gold or higher level, have been playing a combination of Mid / ADC in Solo Q since I've been back, but was mainly a top laner back in S3.

IGN: Antkins, hit me up in game for a chat.

also live in Adelaide if that makes a difference.
